column4: Is there a way to "translate" in xorg language the screen configuration of the windows nvidia control center?
i know i repeat myself but theres people coming inside
Is there a way to "translate" in xorg language the screen configuration of the windows nvidia control center?
i mean the values of that configuration
i've got the values of the windows program, i just don't know where to put them
windows control center has a personalized screen section built in
Yes, you can configure all that manually in Xorg.
However, like gnuB_Chris said, when you install the nVidia drivers, that should all be configured automatically for you.
And did you go to System -> Preferences -> Screen Resolution?
Is that the model number of your monitor?
